医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
快感缺乏：深部子宫内膜异位症隐藏的心理代价近 30% 患有深度子宫内膜异位症的女性会出现快感敏感性降低（快感缺失）的情况，这与慢性盆腔疼痛有关，凸显了这种情况被忽视的心理后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Anhedonia-The-hidden-psychological-toll-of-deep-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Anhedonia-The-hidden-psychological-toll-of-deep-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1083bbac-1d96-40df-92dd-2b32e7f74a9c Mon, 06 Jan 2025 20:17:00 -0500 Anhedonia: The hidden psychological toll of deep endometriosis
人工智能诊断为苏丹崩溃的卫生系统带来了希望一位高级官员表示，在数十名医生在该国近两年的内战中丧生后，苏丹卫生当局正在转向人工智能来加强卫生系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/AI-diagnostics-offer-hope-for-Sudans-collapsing-health-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/AI-diagnostics-offer-hope-for-Sudans-collapsing-health-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95e2653c-75fb-4da2-afdb-f9f0e615477e Mon, 06 Jan 2025 13:11:00 -0500 AI diagnostics offer hope for Sudan's collapsing health system
研究揭示了触发 DNA 损伤免疫反应的新途径加州大学欧文分校的一个研究小组揭示了一种以前未知的机制，当细胞 DNA 受损时，该机制会引发细胞炎症免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Study-unveils-novel-pathway-triggering-immune-response-to-DNA-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Study-unveils-novel-pathway-triggering-immune-response-to-DNA-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0392bf98-26c9-4da4-85ee-faa512eb0e39 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 12:57:23 -0500 Study unveils novel pathway triggering immune response to DNA damage
骨折联络服务对于应对全球骨质疏松症挑战至关重要《新英格兰医学杂志》上发表的一篇新观点文章强调了骨折联络服务 (FLS) 在解决全球日益增长的骨质疏松相关骨折（尤其是髋部骨折）负担方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Fracture-Liaison-Services-crucial-for-addressing-global-osteoporosis-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Fracture-Liaison-Services-crucial-for-addressing-global-osteoporosis-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee362e64-aadc-4f65-a1b4-de79ccb34d91 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 12:43:17 -0500 Fracture Liaison Services crucial for addressing global osteoporosis challenges
DASH 饮食在 2025 年《美国新闻与世界报道》最佳饮食排名中名列前茅预防高血压的饮食方法（DASH）饮食由彭宁顿生物医学研究中心的科学家部分开发，在 2025 年《美国新闻与世界报道》最佳饮食排名中被认为是第二好的整体饮食和最好的心脏健康饮食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/DASH-Diet-earns-top-spots-in-2025-US-News-World-Report-Best-Diets-Rankings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/DASH-Diet-earns-top-spots-in-2025-US-News-World-Report-Best-Diets-Rankings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13d11310-94a0-4298-8b47-e06b692f74f4 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 12:39:22 -0500 DASH Diet earns top spots in 2025 U.S. News & World Report Best Diets Rankings
事实证明，拔除智齿后非阿片类药物缓解疼痛更有效根据罗格斯健康学院的一项研究，对乙酰氨基酚（泰诺）和布洛芬（布洛芬，布洛芬）的组合比阿片类药物能更好地控制智齿拔除后的疼痛，该研究可能会改变牙医治疗术后疼痛的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Non-opioid-pain-relief-proven-more- effective-after-wisdom-teeth-removal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Non-opioid-pain-relief-proven-more- effective-after-wisdom-teeth-removal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fed84ce-8930-4e5f-a4cf-be3f7f85bf2f Mon, 06 Jan 2025 12:31:19 -0500 Non-opioid pain relief proven more effective after wisdom teeth removal
饮食在塑造肠道微生物组和健康方面发挥着关键作用众所周知，富含蔬菜的多样化饮食有益于健康。过量食用肉类，尤其是红肉，会导致慢性疾病和心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Diet-plays-key-role-in-shaping-gut-microbiome-and-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Diet-plays-key-role-in-shaping-gut-microbiome-and-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27995596-c579-4cde-8f6f-d6a2f6728f18 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 12:15:49 -0500 Diet plays key role in shaping gut microbiome and health
很少给跨性别青少年开青春期阻滞剂和性别肯定激素哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院、哈佛 Pilgrim 医疗保健研究所和 FOLX Health 的研究人员的一项新研究表明，美国跨性别和性别多样化 (TGD) 青少年很少服用青春期阻滞剂和性别肯定激素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Puberty-blockers-and-gender-affirming-hormones-rarely-prescribed-to-transgender-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Puberty-blockers-and-gender-affirming-hormones-rarely-prescribed-to-transgender-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4768a569-927d-44a1-b8aa-fe677ffdcc29 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 12:06:06 -0500 Puberty blockers and gender-affirming hormones rarely prescribed to transgender youth
研究 CircRNA 对癌症进展和耐药性的影响研究人员概述了细胞外circRNA在癌症中的调控网络及其对癌症耐药性的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Investigating-the-impact-of-CircRNAs-on-cancer-progression-and-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Investigating-the-impact-of-CircRNAs-on-cancer-progression-and-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c55fc9ad-9096-4d9e-bc91-d169ce9a4fc3 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 11:49:49 -0500 Investigating the impact of CircRNAs on cancer progression and drug resistance
含糖饮料导致数百万糖尿病和心脏病病例塔夫茨大学 Gerald J. 和 Dorothy R. Friedman 营养科学与政策学院研究人员的一项新研究于 1 月 6 日发表在《自然医学》杂志上，该研究估计，2 型糖尿病新发病例为 220 万例，糖尿病新发病例为 120 万例。由于饮用含糖饮料，全球每年都会发生心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Sugary-beverages-contribute-to-millions-of-diabetes-and-heart-disease-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Sugary-beverages-contribute-to-millions-of-diabetes-and-heart-disease-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e792dc54-ca74-49df-81a0-61baba138881 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 11:40:08 -0500 Sugary beverages contribute to millions of diabetes and heart disease cases
